page.title: 16LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content:
RECREATION GROUND IN BIGGIN HILL
The recreation ground has 3 football pitches, 3 tennis courts, a small playground for young children and the spitfire Youth Club. There is a car park, (area 720 metres) with space for 44 cars. There are toilets and two drinking fountains. The Spitfire Centre is used for play school four days a week. Play school starts at 9.30 and ends at 12 noon. At the mother and babies club, the mums chat and the babies play. The spitfire Centre is open after school for youths to go and chat and eat their sweets. The weddings, receptions and birthday parties are held on Saturdays. Some nights it is open for people to go and mix and make new friends. Every week the over 60's can have a chat and play snooker.
